title: How to Import JSON into Figma
content: How to Import JSON into Figma? - The Design System Guide Close JSON # How to Import JSON into Figma? Romina Kavcic Here is the list of Figma plugins that you can use to import JSON into Figma. ## Design Tokens Manager You can export or import Figma Variables Export Styles to JSON files Import Tokens from JSON files üîó Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1263743870981744253/design-tokens-manager ] ## Tokens Studio Gives you the ability to use Design Tokens that can be used for a whole range of design options, from border radii or spacer units to semantic color and typography styles that are able to reference other tokens. It allows you to change tokens and see these changes applied to the whole document, its styles or just a selection. Generate Tokens with the UI or with your own JSON. Create or update Type, Color or Shadow Styles based on tokens. Reference tokens in each other to create type scales, container paddings or semantic colors. üîó Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/843461159747178978/tokens-studio-for-figma] ## Design Tokens Export Figma styles and custom tokens to a style dictionary ready json or sync to github. üîó Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/888356646278934516/design-tokens] Next question How to automatically create specifications in Figma? Published on: Aug 27, 2024 Updated: Updated: Oct 21, 2024 ## Latest additions Glossary I need checklists for creating new Figma components Top 15 Design Systems in 2024 Design system podcasts Design systems using Web Components I'm Romina Kavcic. I coach design teams on implementing design systems, optimizing design processes, and developing design strategy. I'm Romina Kavcic. I coach design teams on implementing design systems, optimizing design processes, and developing design strategy.
